dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
FEniCS is organized as a collection of interoperable components that
together form the FEniCS Project. These components include the problem-
solving environment DOLFIN, the form compiler FFC, the finite element
tabulator FIAT, the just-in-time compiler Instant / Dijitso, the code
generation interface UFC, the form language UFL and a range of
additional components.
dependent_to.name: fenics

dependent_to.description:
The FEniCS Form Compiler FFC is a compiler for finite element
variational forms, translating high-level mathematical descriptions of
variational forms into efficient low-level C++ code for finite element
assembly.
dependent_to.name: py-fenics-ffc

description: A Python module for distributed just-in-time shared library building
name: py-fenics-dijitso

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
